abstract: William A. Ackman’s hedge fund has come to the aid of General Growth Properties, the mall operator that filed for bankruptcy on Thursday. But that help comes with a price.
snippet: William A. Ackman’s hedge fund has come to the aid of General Growth Properties, the mall operator that filed for bankruptcy on Thursday. But that help comes with a price.
lead_paragraph: Update | 5:57 p.m. William A. Ackman’s hedge fund has come to the aid of General Growth Properties, the mall operator that filed for bankruptcy on Thursday. But that help comes with a price.

headline.main: Ackman’s Pricey Lifeline to General Growth

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
